channel.title: Collaboration on Joshua Mauldin
channel.description: Recent content in Collaboration on Joshua Mauldin

item.title: How To Give Effective Feedback Remotely (Smashing Magazine)
item.description: I wrote about how to give good feedback to other designers and why it’s worth the effort.

item.title: How using Cranky Conclusions makes tough conversations easier
item.description: Ever needed to tell a teammate something tough but fear they’ll get too defensive? Here’s one way that’s proven to work.

item.title: The Prime Directive and the limits of assuming positive intent
item.description: I tackled the notion of assuming positive intent when it comes to conflict. It isn’t as good an idea as you might think.

item.title: Spock, Kirk, and the ideal designer/engineer relationship
item.description: I’ve long been a fan of collaboration between design and engineering.
